name: SEOCE – SEO Content Editor
author: EktorCaba

sections.description:
Attach to your posts your keyword research an other instructions to your editors. After your data recolection and keyword research, append your valuable requirements for your editors on posts.

Set on every posts your number of this requirements:

  • Words
  • Quantity of images
  • Paragraphs & bold words
  • H1 & H2 number of tags
  • Internal & external links
  • Keyword counting
  • Highlighted & colored density keywords
  • WordPress classic editor support
  • JSON import data
  • Free Generator
  • Optional Analyze of Google Serp
  • Shift key or mouse over to highlight
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. A new metabox appear on your classic editor.
  4. A button on plugins page or in settings menu, for the generator form.
sections.faq:
Is free to use?

Yes, but to reward my work please donate here
